description1: is a dynamic digital platform built to empower creativity, self-expression, and community storytelling.
description2: Whether it's sharing a compelling video in
description5: or engaging with unique content across modules like
description6: and more — WotchGotcha provides a space for users to create, share, and connect.
mission1: Our mission is to give voice to everyone — from creators and fans to storytellers and everyday users — through a secure and intuitive interface.
mission2: We combine multimedia engagement with social interaction to bring a personalized, content-rich experience for every visitor.
mission3: With a focus on inclusivity, usability, and innovation,
mission4: is not just a platform — it's your digital stage to showcase what matters to you.
termsIntro: These Terms and Conditions ("Terms") govern your use of our website and services. By accessing or using WotchGotcha, you agree to be bound by these Terms.
termsDisagree: If you do not agree with these Terms, please do not use the platform.
section1Content: You must be at least 13 years old to use WotchGotcha. By using the platform, you confirm that you meet the eligibility requirements.
section2List: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials.
You agree to provide accurate and complete information during registration.
You are solely responsible for any activity that occurs under your account.
section3Intro: You may upload videos, images, open letters, comments, and other content ("User Content") under the following conditions:
section3List: You own or have rights to the content you upload.
Your content must not contain illegal, harmful, or offensive material.
WotchGotcha has the right to remove or restrict any content that violates these terms.
section3License: By submitting content, you grant WotchGotcha a non-exclusive, royalty-free license to use, display, and distribute your content within the platform.
section4Intro: While using WotchGotcha, you agree not to:
section4List: Violate any applicable laws or regulations
Upload viruses, malware, or other harmful code
Harass, threaten, or abuse other users
Use bots, scrapers, or similar tools for data extraction
section5Content: Your use of the platform is also governed by our
section6Content: All content, features, and functionality on WotchGotcha (excluding user content) are owned by us or our licensors and protected by copyright and trademark laws.
section7Content: We may suspend or terminate your account at any time for violations of these Terms or any applicable laws, with or without prior notice.
section8Intro: WotchGotcha is provided "as-is" and "as-available." We are not liable for any damages resulting from:
section8List: Your use or inability to use the platform
Content posted by users or third parties
Any technical issues or errors on the platform
section9Content: We may update these Terms periodically. Continued use of the platform after changes implies your acceptance of the updated Terms.
section10Content: These Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of [Insert Country/State].
section11Intro: If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact:
introParagraph-P: WotchGotcha ("we", "our", or "us") respects your privacy and is committed to protecting the personal information you provide through our platform. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our web application.
section1aContent-P: We may collect personal details you provide directly, including:
section1aList-P: Name, email address, phone number, and address
Uploaded profile images, signatures, and content (e.g., videos, photos, open letters)
section1bList-P: IP address, browser type, device type
Pages visited, access time, referring websites
section1cContent-P: Information you upload or submit including:
section1cList-P: Videos, images, comments, likes, open letters
Categories and tags associated with your content
section2List-P: To create and manage user accounts
To personalize user experience and content display
To enable user-generated content sharing, liking, and commenting
To improve our platform’s functionality and performance
To communicate with you regarding updates, support, and changes
section3Intro-P: We do not sell or rent your personal information. However, we may share your data with:
section3List-P: Service providers assisting in operations and analytics
Legal authorities, if required by law
Other users, only to the extent you publicly share content
section4Intro-P: We take reasonable steps to protect your information using:
section4List-P: Regular security audits and restricted access
section4Note-P: However, no method of transmission is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.
section5List-P: Access and review your personal data
Update or delete your account information
Request the removal of any uploaded content
Opt-out of marketing or notification emails
section6Intro-P: We may use cookies or similar technologies to:
section6Note-P: You may disable cookies through your browser settings.
section7Content-P: Our platform is not intended for users under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children.
section8Intro-P: We may update this Privacy Policy at any time. Changes will be notified via:
section9Intro-P: For any questions regarding this Privacy Policy, please contact:
